description: <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks inflict <hyperlink>Sundered Defense</hyperlink>

description: <bulletlist><bullet>+25% damage on Flanking attacks.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Cunning

description: This unit grants double the morale bonus to its allies when killing an enemy.
name: Inspiring

description: This unit inflicts double morale penalties when killing an enemy.
name: Brutal

description: This unit does not trigger <hyperlink>Opportunity Attack</hyperlink>.
name: Slick

description: Unit has +5% <hyperlink>Critical Hit</hyperlink> chance..

name: Unyielding

description: Unit has +1 <hyperlink>Retaliation Attack</hyperlink>.
name: Retaliator

description:
This unit ignores the effects of terrain in combat.
This unit is not stopped by enemy Zone of Control
name: Ranger

description:
Upon sustaining damage, this unit teleports to a random location within 2 hexes.

Works once per turn.
Unit has Frail
name: Unstable

description: <hyperlink>Melee</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks apply <hyperlink>Sundered Defense</hyperlink>.

description: <hyperlink>Melee</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks apply <hyperlink>Sundered Resistance</hyperlink>.

description: <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks deal +{COMBAT_TRAIT_22_DMG>ResolvedMultiplier}% damage.
name: Warmage

description:
At the end of this unit's turn, adjacent enemy units have a base 90% of losing -5 Morale.

Doesn't affect Tier V and hero units.
name: Intimidating

description: Has the <hyperlink>Consume Chaos</hyperlink> ability (from the Chaos Eater).
name: Feed on Chaos

description: Has the <hyperlink>Healing Sap</hyperlink> ability (from the Entwined Protector).
name: Rooted Healer

description:
Unaffected by the bonus effects of Charge attacks.



Can be counteracted by using Heavy Charge Strike.
name: Immovable

description: Has the <hyperlink>Conjure Animal</hyperlink> ability (from the Wildspeaker).
name: Beastmaster

description: <hyperlink>Support</hyperlink> abilities grant +{amount} {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.REGENERATION.Hyperlink} to affected units.
name: Healer
